panels.description: This graph shows duration of calls per interval (must multiply by 60 to get values for 1 min intervals - if scraping is also 1 min). If irate returns the value change per second, then following the rate should give the same result in observed interval as gauge for last scrape. Example: you can sample: 0, 5, 10, 15, 20... i know that the next value will be 25 because I know the rate of change.
panels.title: Calls duration rate
